name: Superiority of Reach
simple_desc: When they are the target of an ally's Ability, their next attack's Wind RES PEN increases. This effect can be triggered again after 2 turns.
desc: When Dan Heng is the target of an ally's ability, his next attack's Wind RES PEN increases by #1[i]%. This effect can be triggered again after #2[i] turn(s).
